gym_esper_010_receptionist_02:
Let me register you as a challenger. Your name is
[trnm:0], yes?
gym_esper_010_receptionist_03:
Great! Now, in order to face Gym Leader Tulip,
you’ll first need to pass the Gym Test.
gym_esper_010_receptionist_04:
Here at the Alfornada Gym, that means working
up a sweat with a special kind of [clr:6]exercise[clr:0]!
gym_esper_010_receptionist_05:
I’m talking about the [clr:6]Emotional Spectrum[clr:0]
[clr:6]Practice[clr:0] created by Tulip herself, of course.\r
Complete it, and you pass the test!
gym_esper_010_receptionist_06:
The woman wearing the black tracksuit in the
practice area will explain the rules to you.\c
Just turn left after leaving the Gym and you’ll
find the practice area right next door.
gym_esper_010_receptionist_07: Now get out there and have fun!
